fields.name: hit
fields.value: the number of hits. if minus value is given, print numbers instead of stars. default is one

fields.name: list
fields.value: list of candidates. You can make the ladder lottery by cutting the sent text with a space delimiter. if nothing is given, display name in the server is used

fields.name: xdy
fields.value: roll y dice that yield a maximum of x. exp) 3d6 means that roll three 6-sided dice.

title: /rps
desc: play rock-paper-scissors game with the CPU

fields.name: bon
fields.value: indicates how many runs first to win. default is 1

fields.name: bon
fields.value: indicates how many runs first to win. default is 1.

fields.name: pl
fields.value: indicates the number of participants. default is 2.

title: /stats
desc: create a graph showing how many VC one user has participated in the last week.

fields.name: member
fields.value: indicates the user. default is command user.

title: /astat
desc: create a graph showing how mamy people has participated in VC in one night

fields.name: year
fields.value: indicates the night's year. default is this year.

fields.name: month
fields.value: indicates the night's month. default is this month

fields.name: day
fields.value: indicates the night's day. default is today

title: /sudo
desc: execute commands that require administrative privileges

fields.name: member
fields.value: indicates whose information is referenced. default is the command user.

fields.name: year
fields.value: indicates the calendar's year. default is this year.

fields.name: month
fields.value: indicates the calendar's month. default is this month.
